import React, {Component} from "react"; import {Container, Row, Col, Card, Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import '../styles/Home.css'; import dog from '../assets/dogc.jpg' import image from '../assets/homw1.png' import {resetID, resetUsername, Userlogout} from "../components/CurrentUser"; import {register} from "../api"; import {Redirect} from "react-router-dom"; export default class Login extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { path: '', userType: '', redirectState: false }; } render() { if (this.state.redirectState === true) { return } return (

Welcome to Animal Shapes!

Convenient Online Animal Diagnosis System

Animal Shapes is a tool to understand how different stakeholder groups perceive and normalise flat-faced dogs, and let the researcher know whether the ideal dog they choose considered health and cute.

Provide Feedback For These Cute Dogs.

Pick up your ideal dog and get the feedback whether it has a health problem

Core features

Receipt Management

Monthly Spending

Expense Calculator

Wanna try Animal Shapes? Register today!

register(e, this)}>
